Player History
Drafted in 29th round, 455th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Traded from Colorado to Philadelphia on 2/11/2016 (Going to PHI: 1B Rey Vinci. Going to COL: P Justin Hamlett)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2016, off Leigh Gil (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/2016, off Leigh Gil (CIN)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Atlanta on 6/10/2016...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Montreal on 7/27/2016...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against St. Louis (C) on 9/18/2016...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,514,286 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,514,286 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Detroit on 9/3/2018...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,514,286 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/10/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 2/20/2020.
Was claimed off waivers by Kansas City on 4/22/2020.
